channel.title: Websearch help
channel.description:
Well, the goal was to make a 508 item search engine, and with help from john we did it. :)
check it out http://www.item-db.co.nr/

thanks bro, your a life saver

item.title: Websearch help
item.dc:creator: @imjohn10 imjohn10
item.description:
@imjohn10 wrote:

Here is a quick one i made:

[code]<?php
$con = mysql_connect(‘server’, ‘username’, ‘password’);
mysql_select_db(‘database’);

$run_query = false;

if ($_POST['name'] != '') {
	$name = (get_magic_quotes_gpc()) ? stripslashes($_POST['name']) : $_POST['name'] ;

	$safe_name = htmlentities($name, ENT_QUOTES);

	$sql_safe_name = mysql_real_escape_string($name);
	
	$run_query = true;
}

?>

moparsearch body { background-image: url('http://www.theapplecollection.com/desktop/large_2005/aqau2560x1600.jpg'); } Part of the name: <?php if ($run_query === true) { $query = mysql_query("SELECT * FROM `items` WHERE `item_name` LIKE '%$sql_safe_name%'"); 
			echo 'Your search for <strong>'.$safe_name.'</strong> got <strong>'.mysql_num_rows($query).'</strong> results.<br />';

			while ($this_item = mysql_fetch_array($query)) {
				echo $this_item['item_id'] . ' - ' . $this_item['item_name'] . '<br />';
			}
		}
	?>
</body>
[/code]

The database is set up like so:

CREATE TABLE `items` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `item_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `item_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;

Any problems/questions pm me.

Read full topic

item.title: Websearch help
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

Use a MySQL DB and query it to see if something is like it in the DB and echo the results that are “like” what you searched.
